name: Light Ball
description: Learned as an egg move when one of the parents is holding a Light Ball.

name: Form Change
description: Learned when the Pokémon changes to this form.

name: Shadow
description: Moves already known by Shadow Pokémon when they are captured.

name: Purification
description: Learned by Shadow Pokémon in Colosseum and XD as they are purified.
